column4: I have a problem: I run an old AMD computer, with 128Mb of ram, and 2-3Gb harddrive, right after I instal the ubuntu-server edition it asks me to remove the CD, I do, then it reboots, when it comes to GRUB loader, I press to go ahead and continue loading normally, as if this was an ordinary boot up, then suddenly in 0.5seconds after GRUB starts loading ubuntu, the whole computer restarts, and this ordeal will repeat itself with
maybe a hardware problem ? run memtest86.
